channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15284] Make TimeRange constructors IA.Private and remove unused TimeRange constructors
item.summary: Make TimeRange constructors IA.Private and remove unused TimeRange constructors

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.

comments.comment: Also see related HBASE-15283 for corresponding changes on the 1.x lines.

typo here? 


+ * Can be returned and read by should not be directly created by clients.  All constructors are

TimeRange is in io package, while it should be in client it seems. Should we also change that in 2.0?
it's IA.Pulic and IS.Stable, which IIRC means we're supposed to give a full major version deprecation cycle. a breaking change as severe as a package move rates such a warning.
v3: fixed the typo enis pointed out.
